content.vi:
The Ultimate Guide to Lash Extension Aftercare in HCMC

After investing in a premium lash set at Nanky Beauty, keeping them beautiful and long-lasting is the top priority. HCMC's hot and humid climate can be tough on lashes, but with the right care, you can double your retention. Here is the A-Z guide from our Masters.

1. The Golden Rule: Keep Them Dry for 24-48 Hours

This is crucial for the adhesive to fully cure. Our premium Korean glue needs time to form a waterproof bond.

  • Avoid: Swimming, saunas, steam rooms, and hot showers immediately after your appointment.
  • Tip: Use a cool, damp cloth to clean your face, avoiding the eye area.

2. Cleanse Daily with Lash Foam

Many clients are afraid to wash their lashes, but dirty lashes fall out faster! Oil, dust, and makeup buildup break down the glue.

  • How to: Use a specialized Lash Cleanser (Foam). Apply foam to a soft brush and gently massage the lash line. Rinse with cool water.
  • Don't: Never use cotton pads or Q-tips as fibers can snag and pull out your extensions.

3. Brush Your Lashes Daily

Just like hair, lashes can get messy after sleeping. Brushing keeps them neat and prevents tangling.

  • Routine: Brush every morning and after washing (once dry).
  • Tool: Use the complimentary spoolie brush provided by Nanky Beauty. Support the lashes with your finger and brush from the middle to the tips.

4. Avoid Oil-Based Products

Oil is the "kryptonite" of lash glue. It dissolves the bond, causing extensions to slide off prematurely.

  • Check your skincare: Avoid oil-based makeup removers, cleansers, and eye creams around the eyes.
  • Select: Look for "Oil-Free" or "Lash Safe" on labels.

Follow these simple steps, and your lashes will stay stunning for weeks! If you need a refill or professional removal, book an appointment at Nanky Beauty District 2.
